# HumanBodyPose3DObservation.EstimationTechnique.reference

**Case**

A technique that uses a reference height.

## Declaration

```swift
case reference
```

## Getting estimation techniques

- **HumanBodyPose3DObservation.EstimationTechnique.measured**: A technique that uses LiDAR depth data to measure body height, in meters.
